edu.jhu.cs.oose.fall2014.shuffletter.iface

Interface ShuffletterModelListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NoOpShuffletterModelListener

    public interface ShuffletterModelListener
    An interface implemented by any class used to capture events from a Shuffletter model.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void gameEnded()
      Indicates that the game has ended.
      void illegalMoveMade(ShuffletterIllegalMoveEvent event)
      Indicates that the player has attempted to make an illegal move.
      void roundEnded()
      Indicates that a round has ended.
      void tileMoved(ShuffletterTileMovedEvent event)
      Indicates that a tile was moved in the model from one grid location to another.
      void tilePlayed(ShuffletterTilePlayedEvent event)
      Indicates that a tile was played from the supply.

    • Method Detail

      • tileMoved

        void tileMoved(ShuffletterTileMovedEvent event)
        Indicates that a tile was moved in the model from one grid location to another.
        Parameters:
        event - The event object describing the movement.

      • tilePlayed

        void tilePlayed(ShuffletterTilePlayedEvent event)
        Indicates that a tile was played from the supply.
        Parameters:
        event - The event object describing the play.

      • roundEnded

        void roundEnded()
        Indicates that a round has ended.

      • gameEnded

        void gameEnded()
        Indicates that the game has ended.

      • illegalMoveMade

        void illegalMoveMade(ShuffletterIllegalMoveEvent event)
        Indicates that the player has attempted to make an illegal move. A description of the illegal move is provided.
        Parameters:
        event - The event object describing the illegal move.
